017package org.microbean.loader.api;
018
019import java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType;
020import java.lang.reflect.Type;
021import java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable;
022
023import java.util.List;
024import java.util.ServiceLoader;
025
026import org.microbean.development.annotation.EntryPoint;
027import org.microbean.development.annotation.OverridingDiscouraged;
028
029import org.microbean.invoke.OptionalSupplier;
030
031import org.microbean.path.Path;
032import org.microbean.path.Path.Element;
033
034import org.microbean.qualifier.Qualifiers;
035
036import org.microbean.type.JavaType.Token;
037
038/**
039 * An {@link OptionalSupplier} that {@linkplain #get() supplies} an
040 * environmental object, and can {@linkplain #load(Path) load} others.
041 *
042 * <p><strong>Note:</strong> {@link Loader} implementations are
043 * expected to be immutable with respect to the methods exposed by
044 * this interface.  All methods in this interface that have a {@link
045 * Loader}-typed return type require their implementations to return a
046 * <em>new</em> {@link Loader}.</p>
047 *
048 * <p>The presence of the {@link
049 * OverridingDiscouraged @OverridingDiscouraged} annotation on a
050 * method means that undefined behavior may result if an
051 * implementation of this interface provides an alternate
052 * implementation of the method in question.</p>
053 *
054 * @param <T> the type of environmental objects this {@link Loader}
055 * {@linkplain #get() supplies}
056 *
057 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
058 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
059 *
060 * @see #loader()
061 *
062 * @see OptionalSupplier#get()
063 *
064 * @see #load(Path)
065 */
066public interface Loader<T> extends OptionalSupplier<T> {
067
068  /**
069   * Returns the {@link Loader} that is the parent of this {@link
070   * Loader}.
071   *
072   * <p>The {@linkplain #root() root <code>Loader</code>} is defined
073   * to be the only one whose {@link #parent()} method returns itself.
074   * It follows that in general a {@link Loader} implementation should
075   * not return {@code this}.  See {@link #isRoot()} for details.</p>
076   *
077   * @return the {@link Loader} that is the parent of this {@link
078   * Loader}; not {@code this} in almost all circumstances
079   *
080   * @nullability Implementations of this method must not return
081   * {@code null}.
082   *
083   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
084   * and deterministic.
085   *
086   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
087   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
088   *
089   * @see #root()
090   *
091   * @see #isRoot()
092   *
093   * @see #loader()
094   */
095  public Loader<?> parent();
096
097  /**
098   * Returns the <strong>{@linkplain Path#absolute()
099   * absolute}</strong> representation of the {@link Path} that was
100   * supplied to an invocation of this {@link Loader}'s {@linkplain
101   * #parent() parent <code>Loader</code>}'s {@link #load(Path)}
102   * method and that resulted in this {@link Loader} being {@linkplain
103   * #load(Path) loaded} as a result.
104   *
105   * <p>Implementations of this method must return an {@linkplain
106   * Path#absolute() absolute} {@link Path} that adheres to these
107   * requirements or undefined behavior will result.</p>
108   *
109   * @return the <strong>{@linkplain Path#absolute()
110   * absolute}</strong> representation of the {@link Path} that was
111   * supplied to an invocation of this {@link Loader}'s {@linkplain
112   * #parent() parent <code>Loader</code>}'s {@link #load(Path)}
113   * method and that resulted in this {@link Loader} being {@linkplain
114   * #load(Path) loaded} as a result
115   *
116   * @nullability Implementations of this method must not return
117   * {@code null}.
118   *
119   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
120   * and deterministic.
121   *
122   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
123   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
124   *
125   * @see #load(path)
126   *
127   * @see Path#absolute()
128   */
129  public Path<? extends Type> path(); // must be absolute
130
131  /**
132   * Uses the addressing information encoded in the supplied {@link
133   * Path} to load and return the {@link Loader} logically found at
134   * that location, following additional contractual requirements
135   * defined below.
136   *
137   * <p>Any {@link Loader} returned by an implementation of this
138   * method:</p>
139   *
140   * <ul>
141   *
142   * <li>must not be {@code null}</li>
143   *
144   * <li>must implement its {@link #get() get()} method and its {@link
145   * #determinism() determinism()} method to indicate the transitory
146   * or permanent presence or absence of any value it might
147   * {@linkplain #get() supply}</li>
148   *
149   * </ul>
150   *
151   * <p>An implementation of this method <strong>must</strong> first
152   * call {@link #normalize(Path)} with the supplied {@link Path}, and
153   * <strong>must</strong> use the {@link Path} returned by that
154   * method in place of the supplied {@link Path}, or undefined
155   * behavior will result.</p>
156   *
157   * <p>The default implementations of all other methods in this
158   * interface named {@code load} call this method.</p>
159   *
160   * @param <U> the type of the environmental object the returned
161   * {@link Loader} can {@linkplain #get() supply}
162   *
163   * @param path the {@link Path} (perhaps only partially) identifying
164   * the {@link Loader} to load; must not be {@code null}; may be
165   * {@linkplain Path#absolute() absolute} or relative (in which case
166   * it will be {@linkplain Path#plus(Path) appended} to {@linkplain
167   * #path() this <code>Loader</code>'s <code>Path</code>})
168   *
169   * @return a {@link Loader} for the supplied {@link Path}; must not
170   * be {@code null}, but may implement its {@link #get() get()}
171   * method and its {@link #determinism() determinism()} method to
172   * indicate the transitory or permanent presence or absence of any
173   * value it might {@linkplain #get() supply}
174   *
175   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code path} is {@code null}
176   *
177   * @exception ClassCastException if the implementation is
178   * implemented improperly
179   *
180   * @see #get()
181   *
182   * @see #determinism()
183   *
184   * @see #normalize(Path)
185   */
186  @EntryPoint
187  public <U> Loader<U> load(final Path<? extends Type> path);
188
189  /**
190   * Builds a {@link Path} from the supplied arguments, calls the
191   * {@link #load(Path)} method and returns its result.
192   *
193   * @param <U> the type of environmental objects the returned {@link Loader}
194   * {@linkplain #get() will supply}
195   *
196   * @param qualifiers the path's {@link Qualifiers}; must not be
197   * {@code null}
198   *
199   * @param type the path's {@link Type}; must not be {@code null}
200   *
201   * @return a {@link Loader}
202   *
203   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
204   *
205   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
206   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
207   *
208   * @idempotency No guarantees are made about idempotency or
209   * determinism with respect to this method or its (discouraged)
210   * overrides.
211   *
212   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
213   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
214   *
215   * @see Path#of(Qualifiers, Element)
216   *
217   * @see Element#of(Object, String)
218   *
219   * @see #load(Path)
220   */
221  @OverridingDiscouraged
222  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
223  public default <U> Loader<U> load(final Qualifiers<? extends String, ?> qualifiers, final Type type) {
224    if (type instanceof Class<?> c) {
225      return this.load(qualifiers, (Class<U>)c);
226    }
227    return this.load(Path.of(qualifiers, Element.of(type, "")));
228  }
229
230  /**
231   * Builds a {@link Path} from the supplied arguments, calls the
232   * {@link #load(Path)} method and returns its result.
233   *
234   * @param <U> the type of environmental objects the returned {@link Loader}
235   * {@linkplain #get() will supply}
236   *
237   * @param type the path's {@link Type}; must not be {@code null}
238   *
239   * @return a {@link Loader}
240   *
241   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
242   *
243   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
244   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
245   *
246   * @idempotency No guarantees are made about idempotency or
247   * determinism with respect to this method or its (discouraged)
248   * overrides.
249   *
250   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
251   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
252   *
253   * @see Path#of(Object)
254   *
255   * @see #load(Path)
256   */
257  @OverridingDiscouraged
258  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
259  public default <U> Loader<U> load(final Type type) {
260    if (type instanceof Class<?> c) {
261      return this.load((Class<U>)c);
262    }
263    return this.load(Path.of(type));
264  }
265
266  /**
267   * Builds a {@link Path} from the supplied arguments, calls the
268   * {@link #load(Path)} method and returns its result.
269   *
270   * @param <U> the type of environmental objects the returned {@link Loader}
271   * {@linkplain #get() will supply}
272   *
273   * @param type the path's {@link Type}; must not be {@code null}
274   *
275   * @param name the {@linkplain Element#name() name} of the last
276   * {@link Element} in the {@link Path}; must not be {@code null}
277   *
278   * @return a {@link Loader}
279   *
280   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
281   *
282   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
283   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
284   *
285   * @idempotency No guarantees are made about idempotency or
286   * determinism with respect to this method or its (discouraged)
287   * overrides.
288   *
289   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
290   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
291   *
292   * @see #load(Path)
293   */
294  @OverridingDiscouraged
295  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
296  public default <U> Loader<U> load(final Type type, final String name) {
297    if (type instanceof Class<?> c) {
298      return this.load((Class<U>)c, name);
299    }
300    return this.load(Path.of(type, name));
301  }
302
303  /**
304   * Builds a {@link Path} from the supplied arguments, calls the
305   * {@link #load(Path)} method and returns its result.
306   *
307   * @param <U> the type of environmental objects the returned {@link Loader}
308   * {@linkplain #get() will supply}
309   *
310   * @param type the path's {@link Type}; must not be {@code null}
311   *
312   * @param names the sequence of names forming the {@link Path}; must
313   * not be {@code null}
314   *
315   * @return a {@link Loader}
316   *
317   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
318   *
319   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
320   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
321   *
322   * @idempotency No guarantees are made about idempotency or
323   * determinism with respect to this method or its (discouraged)
324   * overrides.
325   *
326   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
327   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
328   *
329   * @see #load(Path)
330   */
331  @OverridingDiscouraged
332  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
333  public default <U> Loader<U> load(final Type type, final String... names) {
334    if (type instanceof Class<?> c) {
335      return this.load((Class<U>)c, names);
336    }
337    return this.load(Path.of(type, names));
338  }
339
340  /**
341   * Builds a {@link Path} from the supplied arguments, calls the
342   * {@link #load(Path)} method and returns its result.
343   *
344   * @param <U> the type of environmental objects the returned {@link Loader}
345   * {@linkplain #get() will supply}
346   *
347   * @param type the path's {@link Type}; must not be {@code null}
348   *
349   * @param names the sequence of names forming the {@link Path}; must
350   * not be {@code null}
351   *
352   * @return a {@link Loader}
353   *
354   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
355   *
356   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
357   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
358   *
359   * @idempotency No guarantees are made about idempotency or
360   * determinism with respect to this method or its (discouraged)
361   * overrides.
362   *
363   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
364   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
365   *
366   * @see #load(Path)
367   */
368  @OverridingDiscouraged
369  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
370  public default <U> Loader<U> load(final Type type, final List<? extends String> names) {
371    if (type instanceof Class<?> c) {
372      return this.load((Class<U>)c, names);
373    }
374    return this.load(Path.of(type, names));
375  }
376
377  /**
378   * Builds a {@link Path} from the supplied arguments, calls the
379   * {@link #load(Path)} method and returns its result.
380   *
381   * @param <U> the type of environmental objects the returned {@link Loader}
382   * {@linkplain #get() will supply}
383   *
384   * @param qualifiers the path's {@link Qualifiers}; must not be
385   * {@code null}
386   *
387   * @param type a {@link Token} representing the path's {@link Type};
388   * must not be {@code null}
389   *
390   * @return a {@link Loader}
391   *
392   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
393   *
394   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
395   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
396   *
397   * @idempotency No guarantees are made about idempotency or
398   * determinism with respect to this method or its (discouraged)
399   * overrides.
400   *
401   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
402   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
403   *
404   * @see #load(Path)
405   */
406  @OverridingDiscouraged
407  public default <U> Loader<U> load(final Qualifiers<? extends String, ?> qualifiers, final Token<U> type) {
408    return this.load(qualifiers, type.type());
409  }
410
411  /**
412   * Builds a {@link Path} from the supplied arguments, calls the
413   * {@link #load(Path)} method and returns its result.
414   *
415   * @param <U> the type of environmental objects the returned {@link Loader}
416   * {@linkplain #get() will supply}
417   *
418   * @param type a {@link Token} representing the path's {@link Type};
419   * must not be {@code null}
420   *
421   * @return a {@link Loader}
422   *
423   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
424   *
425   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
426   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
427   *
428   * @idempotency No guarantees are made about idempotency or
429   * determinism with respect to this method or its (discouraged)
430   * overrides.
431   *
432   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
433   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
434   *
435   * @see #load(Path)
436   */
437  @OverridingDiscouraged
438  public default <U> Loader<U> load(final Token<U> type) {
439    return this.load(type.type());
440  }
441
442  /**
443   * Builds a {@link Path} from the supplied arguments, calls the
444   * {@link #load(Path)} method and returns its result.
445   *
446   * @param <U> the type of environmental objects the returned {@link Loader}
447   * {@linkplain #get() will supply}
448   *
449   * @param type a {@link Token} representing the path's {@link Type};
450   * must not be {@code null}
451   *
452   * @param name the {@linkplain Element#name() name} of the last
453   * {@link Element} in the {@link Path}; must not be {@code null}
454   *
455   * @return a {@link Loader}
456   *
457   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
458   *
459   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
460   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
461   *
462   * @idempotency No guarantees are made about idempotency or
463   * determinism with respect to this method or its (discouraged)
464   * overrides.
465   *
466   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
467   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
468   *
469   * @see #load(Path)
470   */
471  @OverridingDiscouraged
472  public default <U> Loader<U> load(final Token<U> type, final String name) {
473    return this.load(type.type(), name);
474  }
475
476  /**
477   * Builds a {@link Path} from the supplied arguments, calls the
478   * {@link #load(Path)} method and returns its result.
479   *
480   * @param <U> the type of environmental objects the returned {@link Loader}
481   * {@linkplain #get() will supply}
482   *
483   * @param type a {@link Token} representing the path's {@link Type};
484   * must not be {@code null}
485   *
486   * @param names the sequence of names forming the {@link Path}; must
487   * not be {@code null}
488   *
489   * @return a {@link Loader}
490   *
491   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
492   *
493   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
494   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
495   *
496   * @idempotency No guarantees are made about idempotency or
497   * determinism with respect to this method or its (discouraged)
498   * overrides.
499   *
500   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
501   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
502   *
503   * @see #load(Path)
504   */
505  @OverridingDiscouraged
506  public default <U> Loader<U> load(final Token<U> type, final String... names) {
507    return this.load(type.type(), names);
508  }
509
510  /**
511   * Builds a {@link Path} from the supplied arguments, calls the
512   * {@link #load(Path)} method and returns its result.
513   *
514   * @param <U> the type of environmental objects the returned {@link Loader}
515   * {@linkplain #get() will supply}
516   *
517   * @param type a {@link Token} representing the path's {@link Type};
518   * must not be {@code null}
519   *
520   * @param names the sequence of names forming the {@link Path}; must
521   * not be {@code null}
522   *
523   * @return a {@link Loader}
524   *
525   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
526   *
527   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
528   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
529   *
530   * @idempotency No guarantees are made about idempotency or
531   * determinism with respect to this method or its (discouraged)
532   * overrides.
533   *
534   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
535   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
536   *
537   * @see #load(Path)
538   */
539  @OverridingDiscouraged
540  public default <U> Loader<U> load(final Token<U> type, final List<? extends String> names) {
541    return this.load(type.type(), names);
542  }
543
544  /**
545   * Builds a {@link Path} from the supplied arguments, calls the
546   * {@link #load(Path)} method and returns its result.
547   *
548   * @param <U> the type of environmental objects the returned {@link Loader}
549   * {@linkplain #get() will supply}
550   *
551   * @param qualifiers the path's {@link Qualifiers}; must not be
552   * {@code null}
553   *
554   * @param type a {@link Class} serving as the path's {@link Type};
555   * must not be {@code null}
556   *
557   * @return a {@link Loader}
558   *
559   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
560   *
561   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
562   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
563   *
564   * @idempotency No guarantees are made about idempotency or
565   * determinism with respect to this method or its (discouraged)
566   * overrides.
567   *
568   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
569   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
570   *
571   * @see #load(Path)
572   */
573  @OverridingDiscouraged
574  public default <U> Loader<U> load(final Qualifiers<? extends String, ?> qualifiers, Class<U> type) {
575    return this.load(Path.of(qualifiers, Element.of(type, "")));
576  }
577
578  /**
579   * Builds a {@link Path} from the supplied arguments, calls the
580   * {@link #load(Path)} method and returns its result.
581   *
582   * @param <U> the type of environmental objects the returned {@link Loader}
583   * {@linkplain #get() will supply}
584   *
585   * @param type a {@link Class} serving as the path's {@link Type};
586   * must not be {@code null}
587   *
588   * @return a {@link Loader}
589   *
590   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
591   *
592   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
593   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
594   *
595   * @idempotency No guarantees are made about idempotency or
596   * determinism with respect to this method or its (discouraged)
597   * overrides.
598   *
599   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
600   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
601   *
602   * @see #load(Path)
603   */
604  @OverridingDiscouraged
605  public default <U> Loader<U> load(final Class<U> type) {
606    return this.load(Path.of(type));
607  }
608
609  /**
610   * Builds a {@link Path} from the supplied arguments, calls the
611   * {@link #load(Path)} method and returns its result.
612   *
613   * @param <U> the type of environmental objects the returned {@link Loader}
614   * {@linkplain #get() will supply}
615   *
616   * @param type a {@link Class} serving as the path's {@link Type};
617   * must not be {@code null}
618   *
619   * @param name the {@linkplain Element#name() name} of the last
620   * {@link Element} in the {@link Path}; must not be {@code null}
621   *
622   * @return a {@link Loader}
623   *
624   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
625   *
626   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
627   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
628   *
629   * @idempotency No guarantees are made about idempotency or
630   * determinism with respect to this method or its (discouraged)
631   * overrides.
632   *
633   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
634   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
635   *
636   * @see #load(Path)
637   */
638  @OverridingDiscouraged
639  public default <U> Loader<U> load(final Class<U> type, final String name) {
640    return this.load(Path.of(type, name));
641  }
642
643  /**
644   * Builds a {@link Path} from the supplied arguments, calls the
645   * {@link #load(Path)} method and returns its result.
646   *
647   * @param <U> the type of environmental objects the returned {@link Loader}
648   * {@linkplain #get() will supply}
649   *
650   * @param type a {@link Class} serving as the path's {@link Type};
651   * must not be {@code null}
652   *
653   * @param names the sequence of names forming the {@link Path}; must
654   * not be {@code null}
655   *
656   * @return a {@link Loader}
657   *
658   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
659   *
660   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
661   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
662   *
663   * @idempotency No guarantees are made about idempotency or
664   * determinism with respect to this method or its (discouraged)
665   * overrides.
666   *
667   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
668   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
669   *
670   * @see #load(Path)
671   */
672  @OverridingDiscouraged
673  public default <U> Loader<U> load(final Class<U> type, final String... names) {
674    return this.load(Path.of(type, names));
675  }
676
677  /**
678   * Builds a {@link Path} from the supplied arguments, calls the
679   * {@link #load(Path)} method and returns its result.
680   *
681   * @param <U> the type of environmental objects the returned {@link Loader}
682   * {@linkplain #get() will supply}
683   *
684   * @param type a {@link Class} serving as the path's {@link Type};
685   * must not be {@code null}
686   *
687   * @param names the sequence of names forming the {@link Path}; must
688   * not be {@code null}
689   *
690   * @return a {@link Loader}
691   *
692   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
693   *
694   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
695   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
696   *
697   * @idempotency No guarantees are made about idempotency or
698   * determinism with respect to this method or its (discouraged)
699   * overrides.
700   *
701   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
702   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
703   *
704   * @see #load(Path)
705   */
706  @OverridingDiscouraged
707  public default <U> Loader<U> load(final Class<U> type, final List<? extends String> names) {
708    return this.load(Path.of(type, names));
709  }
710
711  /**
712   * {@linkplain #transliterate(Path) Transliterates} the supplied
713   * {@link Path}, if needed, after converting the supplied {@link
714   * Path} into an {@linkplain Path#absolute() absolute} {@link Path},
715   * and returns the result.
716   *
717   * <p>Overriding of this method is strongly discouraged.</p>
718   *
719   * <p>Most users will have no need to call this method directly.</p>
720   *
721   * @param <U> the {@link Type} designated by the supplied {@link
722   * Path}
723   *
724   * @param path the {@link Path} to normalize; must not be {@code
725   * null}
726   *
727   * @return a {@link Path} that {@linkplain Path#transliterated() is
728   * transliterated} and {@linkplain Path#absolute() absolute}
729   *
730   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code path} is {@code null}
731   *
732   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
733   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
734   *
735   * @idempotency This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides must
736   * be, idempotent and deterministic.
737   *
738   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
739   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
740   *
741   * @see #transliterate(Path)
742   *
743   * @see Path#transliterated()
744   *
745   * @see Path#absolute()
746   */
747  @OverridingDiscouraged
748  public default <U extends Type> Path<U> normalize(final Path<U> path) {
749    if (path.absolute()) {
750      if (path.transliterated() || path.size() == 1) {
751        return path;
752      } else {
753        return this.transliterate(path);
754      }
755    } else {
756      return this.transliterate(this.path().plus(path));
757    }
758  }
759
760  /**
761   * Returns a {@link Loader}, derived from this {@link Loader}, that
762   * is suitable for a {@linkplain #normalize(Path) normalized
763   * version} of the supplied {@code path}, particularly for cases
764   * where, during the execution of the {@link #load(Path)} method, a
765   * {@link Loader} must be supplied to some other class.
766   *
767   * <p>The returned {@link Loader} must be one whose {@link #path()}
768   * method returns the {@linkplain Path#size() longest} {@link Path}
769   * that is a parent of the ({@linkplain #normalize(Path)
770   * normalized}) supplied {@code path}.  In many cases {@code this}
771   * will be returned.</p>
772   *
773   * <p>Typically only classes implementing this interface will need
774   * to call this method.  Most users will have no need to call this
775   * method directly.</p>
776   *
777   * <p>Overriding of this method is <strong>strongly</strong>
778   * discouraged.</p>
779   *
780   * @param path the {@link Path} in question; must not be {@code
781   * null}
782   *
783   * @return a {@link Loader}, derived from this {@link Loader}, that
784   * is suitable for a {@linkplain #normalize(Path) normalized
785   * version} of the supplied {@code path}, particularly for cases
786   * where, during the execution of the {@link #load(Path)} method, a
787   * {@link Loader} must be supplied to some other class; never {@code
788   * null}
789   *
790   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code path} is {@code null}
791   *
792   * @nullability The default implementation of this method does not,
793   * and its (discouraged) overrides must not, return {@code null}.
794   *
795   * @threadsafety The default implementation of this method is, and
796   * its (discouraged) overrides must be, safe for concurrent use by
797   * multiple threads.
798   *
799   * @idempotency The default implementation of this method is, and
800   * its (discouraged) overrides must be, idempotent and
801   * deterministic.
802   *
803   * @see #normalize(Path)
804   *
805   * @see #transliterate(Path)
806   *
807   * @see #root()
808   */
809  @OverridingDiscouraged
810  public default Loader<?> loaderFor(Path<? extends Type> path) {
811    path = this.normalize(path);
812    Loader<?> requestor = this;
813    final Path<? extends Type> requestorPath = requestor.path();
814    assert requestorPath.absolute() : "!requestorPath.absolute(): " + requestorPath;
815    if (requestorPath.startsWith(path)) {
816      if (!requestorPath.equals(path)) {
817        final int requestorPathSize = requestorPath.size();
818        final int pathSize = path.size();
819        assert requestorPathSize != pathSize;
820        if (requestorPathSize > pathSize) {
821          for (int i = 0; i < requestorPathSize - pathSize; i++) {
822            requestor = requestor.parent();
823          }
824          assert requestor.path().equals(path) : "!requestor.path().equals(path); requestor.path(): " + requestor.path() + "; path: " + path;
825        } else {
826          throw new AssertionError("requestorPath.size() < path.size(); requestorPath: " + requestorPath + "; path: " + path);
827        }
828      } else {
829        requestor = requestor.root();
830      }
831    }
832    return requestor;
833  }
834
835  /**
836   * <em>Transliterates</em> the supplied {@linkplain Path#absolute()
837   * absolute <code>Path</code>} into some other {@link Path}, whose
838   * meaning is the same, but whose representation may be different,
839   * that will be used instead.
840   *
841   * <p>The {@link Path} that is returned may be the {@link Path} that
842   * was supplied.  This may happen, for example, if {@linkplain
843   * Path#transliterated() the path has already been transliterated},
844   * or if the path identifies a transliteration request.</p>
845   *
846   * <p>Path transliteration is needed because the {@link
847   * Element#name() name()} components of {@link Element}s may
848   * unintentionally clash when two components are combined into a
849   * single application.</p>
850   *
851   * <p>Path transliteration must occur during the execution of any
852   * implementation of the {@link #load(Path)} method, such that the
853   * {@link Path} supplied to that method, once it has been verified
854   * to be {@linkplain Path#absolute() absolute}, is supplied to an
855   * implementation of this method. The {@link Path} returned by an
856   * implementation of this method must then be used during the rest
857   * of the invocation of the {@link #load(Path)} method, as if it had
858   * been supplied in the first place.</p>
859   *
860   * <p>Behavior resulting from any other usage of an implementation
861   * of this method is undefined.</p>
862   *
863   * <p>The default implementation of this method uses the
864   * configuration system itself to find a transliterated {@link Path}
865   * corresponding to the supplied {@link Path}, returning the
866   * supplied {@code path} itself if no transliteration can take
867   * place.  Infinite loops are avoided except as noted below.</p>
868   *
869   * <p>Overrides of this method <strong>must not call {@link
870   * #normalize(Path)}</strong> or an infinite loop may result.</p>
871   *
872   * <p>Overrides of this method <strong>must not call {@link
873   * #loaderFor(Path)}</strong> or an infinite loop may
874   * result.</p>
875   *
876   * <p>Overrides of this method <strong>must not call {@link
877   * #load(Path)} with the supplied {@code path}</strong> or an infinite
878   * loop may result.</p>
879   *
880   * <p>An implementation of {@link Loader} will find {@link
881   * Path#transliterate(java.util.function.BiFunction)} particularly
882   * useful in implementing this method.</p>
883   *
884   * <p>Most users will have no need to call this method directly.</p>
885   *
886   * @param <U> the type of the supplied and returned {@link Path}s
887   *
888   * @param path an {@linkplain Path#absolute() absolute
889   * <code>Path</code>}; must not be null
890   *
891   * @return the transliterated {@link Path}; never {@code null};
892   * possibly the supplied {@code path} itself
893   *
894   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code path} is {@code null}
895   *
896   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code path} returns
897   * {@code false} from its {@link Path#absolute() absolute()}
898   * method
899   *
900   * @nullability The default implementation of this method does not,
901   * and its (discouraged) overrides must not, return {@code null}.
902   *
903   * @threadsafety The default implementation of this method is, and
904   * its (discouraged) overrides must be, safe for concurrent use by
905   * multiple threads.
906   *
907   * @idempotency The default implementation of this method is, and
908   * its (discouraged) overrides must be, idempotent and
909   * deterministic.
910   *
911   * @see Path#absolute()
912   *
913   * @see Path#transliterate(java.util.function.BiFunction)
914   *
915   * @see #normalize(Path)
916   *
917   * @see #loaderFor(Path)
918   *
919   * @see #load(Path)
920   */
921  @OverridingDiscouraged
922  public default <U extends Type> Path<U> transliterate(final Path<U> path) {
923    if (path.transliterated()) {
924      return path;
925    }
926    final Element<U> last = path.lastElement();
927    if (last.name().equals("transliterated")) {
928      final Qualifiers<String, ?> lastQualifiers = last.qualifiers();
929      if (lastQualifiers.size() == 1 && lastQualifiers.containsKey("path")) {
930        // Are we in the middle of a transliteration request? Avoid
931        // the infinite loop.
932        return path;
933      }
934    }
935    final ParameterizedType ptype = (ParameterizedType)new Token<Path<U>>() {}.type();
936    final Element<ParameterizedType> e = Element.of(Qualifiers.of("path", path), ptype, "transliterated");
937    final Path<ParameterizedType> p = this.path().plus(e);
938    assert p.lastElement().name().equals("transliterated");
939    assert ((TypeVariable<?>)p.qualified().getActualTypeArguments()[0]).getBounds()[0] == Type.class;
940    return this.<Path<U>>load(p).orElse(path.transliterate());
941  }
942
943  /**
944   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link Loader} is the
945   * root {@link Loader}, which occurs only when the return value of
946   * {@link #parent() this.parent() == this}.
947   *
948   * <p>Overrides of this method are <strong>strongly</strong>
949   * discouraged.</p>
950   *
951   * <p>Most users will have no need to call this method directly.</p>
952   *
953   * @return {@code true} if and only if this {@link Loader} is the
954   * root {@link Loader}
955   *
956   * @idempotency This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides must
957   * be, idempotent and deterministic.
958   *
959   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
960   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
961   *
962   * @see #parent()
963   */
964  @OverridingDiscouraged
965  public default boolean isRoot() {
966    return this.parent() == this;
967  }
968
969  /**
970   * Returns the root {@link Loader}, which is the {@link Loader}
971   * whose {@link #parent()} method returns iteself.
972   *
973   * <p>Overrides of this method are <strong>strongly</strong>
974   * discouraged.</p>
975   *
976   * <p>Most users will have no need to call this method directly.</p>
977   *
978   * @return the root {@link Loader}
979   *
980   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
981   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
982   *
983   * @idempotency This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides must
984   * be, idempotent and deterministic.
985   *
986   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
987   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
988   *
989   * @see #isRoot()
990   *
991   * @see #parent()
992   *
993   * @see Path#root()
994   */
995  @OverridingDiscouraged
996  public default Loader<?> root() {
997    Loader<?> root = this;
998    Loader<?> parent = root.parent();
999    while (parent != null && parent != root) {
1000      // (Strictly speaking, Loader::parent should NEVER be null.)
1001      root = parent;
1002      parent = root.parent();
1003    }
1004    assert root.path().equals(Path.root());
1005    assert this != root ? !this.path().equals(Path.root()) : true;
1006    return root;
1007  }
1008
1009  /**
1010   * Casts this {@link Loader} appropriately and returns it, usually
1011   * so that an implementation's implementation-specific methods can
1012   * be accessed.
1013   *
1014   * @param <L> the {@link Loader} subclass
1015   *
1016   * @param loaderSubclass a {@link Class} representing a subclass of
1017   * {@link Loader}; must not be {@code null}
1018   *
1019   * @return this {@link Loader}
1020   *
1021   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code loaderSubclass} is
1022   * {@code null}
1023   *
1024   * @exception ClassCastException if the cast could not be performed
1025   *
1026   * @nullability This method does not, and its (discouraged)
1027   * overrides must not, return {@code null}.
1028   *
1029   * @idempotency This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides must
1030   * be, idempotent and deterministic.
1031   *
1032   * @threadsafety This method is, and its (discouraged) overrides
1033   * must be, safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
1034   */
1035  @OverridingDiscouraged
1036  public default <L extends Loader<?>> L as(final Class<L> loaderSubclass) {
1037    return loaderSubclass.cast(this);
1038  }
1039
1040  /**
1041   * Bootstraps and returns a {@link Loader}.
1042   *
1043   * <p>If this method has been called before, its prior result is
1044   * returned.</p>
1045   *
1046   * <p>Otherwise, first, the <em>root {@link Loader}</em> is located
1047   * using Java's built-in {@link ServiceLoader}.  The first of the
1048   * {@link Loader} instances it discovers is used and all others are
1049   * ignored.  Note that the {@link ServiceLoader} discovery process
1050   * is non-deterministic.  Normally there is only one such {@link
1051   * Loader} provided by an implementation of this API.</p>
1052   *
1053   * <p>The root {@link Loader} that is loaded via this mechanism is
1054   * subject to the following restrictions:</p>
1055   *
1056   * <ul>
1057   *
1058   * <li>It must return a {@link Path} from its {@link #path()}
1059   * implementation that is {@linkplain Path#equals(Object) equal to}
1060   * {@link Path#root() Path.root()}.</li>
1061   *
1062   * <li>It must return itself ({@code this}) from its {@link
1063   * #parent()} implementation.</li>
1064   *
1065   * <li>It must return {@code true} from its {@link #isRoot()}
1066   * implementation.</li>
1067   *
1068   * <li>It must return itself ({@code this}) from its {@link #root()}
1069   * method.</li>
1070   *
1071   * <li>It must return {@link Determinism#PRESENT} from its {@link
1072   * #determinism() determinism()} method.</li>
1073   *
1074   * <li>It must return itself ({@code this}) from its {@link #get()
1075   * get()} method.</li>
1076   *
1077   * </ul>
1078   *
1079   * <p>Next, this root {@link Loader} is used to {@linkplain
1080   * #load(Path) find} the <em>{@link Loader} of record</em>, which in
1081   * most cases is simply itself.</p>
1082   *
1083   * <p>The {@link Loader} of record is subject to the following
1084   * restrictions (which are compatible with the overwhelmingly common
1085   * case of its also being the root {@link Loader}):</p>
1086   *
1087   * <ul>
1088   *
1089   * <li>It must return a {@link Path} from its {@link #path()}
1090   * implementation that is equal to {@link Path#root() Path.root()}
1091   * (same as above).</li>
1092   *
1093   * <li>It must return {@link Determinism#PRESENT} from its {@link
1094   * #determinism() determinism()} method (same as above).</li>
1095   *
1096   * <li>It must return the bootstrap {@link Loader} from its {@link
1097   * #parent()} implementation (which may be itself ({@code
1098   * this}).</li>
1099   *
1100   * <li>It must return a {@link Loader} implementation, often itself
1101   * ({@code this}), from its {@link #get() get()} method.</li>
1102   *
1103   * </ul>
1104   *
1105   * <p>Undefined behavior will result if an implementation of the
1106   * {@link Loader} interface does not honor the requirements
1107   * above.</p>
1108   *
1109   * <p>This method is the primary entry point for end users of this
1110   * framework.</p>
1111   *
1112   * @return a non-{@code null} {@link Loader} that can be used to
1113   * acquire environmental objects that abides by the requirements and
1114   * restrictions above
1115   *
1116   * @exception IllegalStateException if any of the requirements and
1117   * restrictions above is violated
1118   *
1119   * @exception java.util.ServiceConfigurationError if the root {@link
1120   * Loader} could not be loaded for any reason
1121   */
1122  @EntryPoint
1123  public static Loader<?> loader() {
1124    final class LoaderOfRecord {
1125      private static final Loader<?> INSTANCE;
1126      static {
1127        final Loader<?> rootLoader =
1128          ServiceLoader.load(Loader.class, Loader.class.getClassLoader()).findFirst().orElseThrow();
1129        if (rootLoader.determinism() != Determinism.PRESENT) {
1130          throw new IllegalStateException("rootLoader.determinism() != PRESENT: " + rootLoader.determinism());
1131        } else if (!Path.root().equals(rootLoader.path())) {
1132          throw new IllegalStateException("rootLoader.path(): " + rootLoader.path());
1133        } else if (rootLoader.parent() != rootLoader) {
1134          throw new IllegalStateException("rootLoader.parent(): " + rootLoader.parent());
1135        } else if (rootLoader.get() != rootLoader) {
1136          throw new IllegalStateException("rootLoader.get(): " + rootLoader.get());
1137        } else if (!rootLoader.isRoot()) {
1138          throw new IllegalStateException("!rootLoader.isRoot()");
1139        } else if (rootLoader.root() != rootLoader) {
1140          throw new IllegalStateException("rootLoader.root(): " + rootLoader.root());
1141        }
1142        INSTANCE = rootLoader.<Loader<?>>load(Path.of(new Token<Loader<?>>() {}.type())).orElse(rootLoader);
1143        if (INSTANCE.determinism() != Determinism.PRESENT) {
1144          throw new IllegalStateException("INSTANCE.determinism() != PRESENT: " + INSTANCE.determinism());
1145        } else if (!Path.root().equals(INSTANCE.path())) {
1146          throw new IllegalStateException("INSTANCE.path(): " + INSTANCE.path());
1147        } else if (INSTANCE.parent() != rootLoader) {
1148          throw new IllegalStateException("INSTANCE.parent(): " + INSTANCE.parent());
1149        } else if (!(INSTANCE.get() instanceof Loader)) {
1150          throw new IllegalStateException("INSTANCE.get(): " + INSTANCE.get());
1151        }
1152      }
1153    };
1154    return LoaderOfRecord.INSTANCE;
1155  }
1156
1157}
